issue.title: [JS] Implement sorting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7737](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7737). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I started using apache arrow for a project and it appears to be working really well. One of the things that I'm missing though in order to fully use it is sorting. Lets say I just want to latest 100 items based on the timestamp or something. I don't think there is a way to do this yet?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7737?focusedCommentId=17518168) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
I don't think sorting is something we should be adding to the library itself so we can focus on the rest of the functionality.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7737?focusedCommentId=17586062) by @toddfarmer:*
